channel.title: How can i fix my client so people can connect to it?
channel.description: i am using a 508 server i have a 508 client i trying to figure out why my friend can't connect to it. i already put my ip address in the gui/and client.java and still nothing... :mad: i was wondering if any you guy/girls know how to fix this i been trying all week to figure it out plz pm. ;D

item.title: How can i fix my client so people can connect to it?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Try and see if another source+client works online if you host it to see if the one your trying to host has an anti-leach. Also look up a portforwrding guide, so many out their. I’ve made one before but I deleted it because there is so many out their… nuff said.

Read full topic

Himatchi, for the love of god please just portforward… Himatchi is like using a television from 1970 rather than using a nice 1080P HD 3d tv.

item.title: How can i fix my client so people can connect to it?
item.dc:creator: @bozboz007 bozboz007
item.description:
@bozboz007 wrote:

Make a Hamachi Network and start Server.
Use this Client: xXericXxs 508 IP Changer Client
It’s a Ip Changer also he must start the Client and than he must write your Hamachi IP in.

Just Google it.

item.title: How can i fix my client so people can connect to it?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Well, it is not broken, so you’re not fixing anything.

You need to port-forward. There are tutorials on how to do this everywhere. Search around.

Read full topic
